{{NCAATeamFootballSeason |Year=2009 |Team=Toledo Rockets |Image=Ut logo pd.jpg |Conference=Mid-American Conference |Division=West |ShortConference=MAC |CoachRank= |APRank= |Record=5â7 |ConfRecord=3â5 |HeadCoach=[[Tim Beckman]] |OffCoach= |DefCoach= |OScheme= |DScheme= |StadiumArena=[[Glass Bowl]] |Champion= |BowlTourney= |BowlTourneyResult= }} {{2009 Mid-American Conference football standings}} The '''2009 [[Toledo Rockets]] football team''' represented [[The University of Toledo]] in the college football season of 2009. They competed in [[National Collegiate Athletic Association]] (NCAA) [[Division I (NCAA)|Division I]] [[Division I (NCAA)#Football Bowl Subdivision|Football Bowl Subdivision]] (FBS) [[college football]] during the [[2009 NCAA Division I FBS football season|football season]] and as a member of the [[Mid-American Conference]] (MAC) East Division. The team was coached by [[Tim Beckman]] and played their homes game in the [[Glass Bowl]]. The finished with a record of 5â7 (3â5 MAC). ==Before the season== ===Recruiting=== {{College Athlete Recruit Start|40=yes|collapse=yes|year=2009}} {{College Athlete Recruit Entry | recruit = Manny Bell | position = OL | hometown = Pittsburgh, PA | highschool = Schenley HS | feet = 6 | inches = 6 | weight = 275 | 40 = - | commitdate = 2009-02-02 | scout stars = 2 | rivals stars = 2 | espn grade = 40 }} {{College Athlete Recruit Entry | recruit = Robert Bell | position = LB | hometown = Grand Rapids, MI | highschool = East Grand Rapids HS | feet = 5 | inches = 11 | weight = 225 | 40 = - | commitdate = 2009-01-26 | scout stars = 2 | rivals stars = 3 | espn grade = 40 }} {{College Athlete Recruit Entry | recruit = Julian Bellinger | position = WR | hometown = Lithonia, GA | highschool = Lithonia HS | feet = 6 | inches = 1 | weight = 175 | 40 = - | commitdate = 2009-02-04 | scout stars = 2 | rivals stars = 2 | espn grade = 40 }} {{College Athlete Recruit Entry | recruit = Byron Best | position = DB | hometown = Greenwood, SC | highschool = Greenwood HS | feet = 5 | inches = 10 | weight = 180 | 40 = 4.4 | commitdate = 2009-02-04 | scout stars = 2 | rivals stars = 2 | espn grade = 73 }} {{College Athlete Recruit Entry | recruit = Ryan Casano | position = K | hometown = Costa Mesa, CA | highschool = Orange Coast | feet = 5 | inches = 9 | weight = 180 | 40 = - | commitdate = 2009-02-04 | scout stars = 2 | rivals stars = 2 }} {{College Athlete Recruit Entry | recruit = Austin Dantin | position = QB | hometown = Tallahassee, FL | highschool = Leon HS | feet = 6 | inches = 1 | weight = 175 | 40 = - | commitdate = 2009-02-04 | scout stars = 2 | rivals stars = 2 | espn grade = 73 }} {{College Athlete Recruit Entry | recruit = T.J.
